entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:36 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
